amendment.description: Amendment provides that any defendant who prevails in a federal prosecution will have an opportunity to recover attorney's fees and costs when a court finds that the government was not substantially justified in initiating the case.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reimburse defendants for legal expenses incurred as a result of a Justice Department prosecution that is found to be not substantially justified.
